com.shopify.buy.dataprovider

Interface CustomerService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BuyClient

    public interface CustomerService
    Service that provides Customer API endpoints.

      • createCustomer

        CancellableTask createCustomer(AccountCredentials accountCredentials,
                               Callback<Customer> callback)
        Create a new Customer on Shopify
        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - the account credentials with an email, password, first name, and last name of the Customer to be created, not null
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • createCustomer

        rx.Observable<Customer> createCustomer(AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
        Create a new Customer on Shopify
        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - the account credentials with an email, password, first name, and last name of the Customer to be created, not null
        Returns:
        cold observable that emits created new customer

      • activateCustomer

        CancellableTask activateCustomer(Long customerId,
                                 String activationToken,
                                 AccountCredentials accountCredentials,
                                 Callback<Customer> callback)
        Activate the customer account.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the id of the Customer to activate, not null
        activationToken - the activation token for the Customer, not null or empty
        accountCredentials - the account credentials with a password of the Customer to be activated, not null
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • activateCustomer

        rx.Observable<Customer> activateCustomer(Long customerId,
                                         String activationToken,
                                         AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
        Activate the customer account.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the id of the Customer to activate, not null
        activationToken - the activation token for the Customer, not null or empty
        accountCredentials - the account credentials with a password of the Customer to be activated, not null
        Returns:
        cold observable that emits activated customer account

      • resetPassword

        CancellableTask resetPassword(Long customerId,
                              String resetToken,
                              AccountCredentials accountCredentials,
                              Callback<Customer> callback)
        Reset the password for the customer account.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the id of the Customer to activate, not null
        resetToken - the reset token for the Customer, not null or empty
        accountCredentials - the account credentials with the new password of the Customer. not null
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • resetPassword

        rx.Observable<Customer> resetPassword(Long customerId,
                                      String resetToken,
                                      AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
        Reset the password for the customer account.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the id of the Customer to activate, not null
        resetToken - the reset token for the Customer, not null or empty
        accountCredentials - the account credentials with the new password of the Customer. not null
        Returns:
        cold observable that emits customer account with reset password

      • renewCustomer

        CancellableTask renewCustomer(Callback<CustomerToken> callback)
        Renew the Customer login. This should be called periodically to keep the token up to date.
        Parameters:
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • renewCustomer

        rx.Observable<CustomerToken> renewCustomer()
        Renew the Customer login. This should be called periodically to keep the token up to date.
        Returns:
        cold observable that emits renewed customer token

      • recoverPassword

        CancellableTask recoverPassword(String email,
                                Callback<Void> callback)
        Send a password recovery email. An email will be sent to the email address specified if a customer with that email address exists on Shopify.
        Parameters:
        email - the email address to send the password recovery email to, not null or empty
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • recoverPassword

        rx.Observable<Void> recoverPassword(String email)
        Send a password recovery email. An email will be sent to the email address specified if a customer with that email address exists on Shopify.
        Parameters:
        email - the email address to send the password recovery email to, not null or empty
        Returns:
        cold observable that sends a password recovery email and emits nothing
